column4: hay folks you know when gnome starts and it shows the splash, is there a way to change the color of the screen behind the splash?
I can probably call xsetroot during or before that splash yeah
You can make xsetroot repalce the default X background
now *that* is the million dollar question.
ah got it :) xsetroot -solid brown for example
